sourcesContent:
// src/themes.js
export const THEMES = {
  dark: {
    name: 'Dark Intel',
    icon: '◈',
    bg: '#060e1f',
    bgGrad: 'linear-gradient(160deg,#060e1f 0%,#091525 60%,#06101e 100%)',
    surface: '#080f1f',
    surfaceAlt: '#0a1628',
    border: '#1e3a5f',
    borderLight: '#0d2040',
    accent: '#2563eb',
    accentAlt: '#06b6d4',
    accentGrad: 'linear-gradient(135deg,#1d4ed8,#06b6d4)',
    text: '#e2eaf8',
    textMuted: '#6b8fb5',
    textSub: '#4da6ff',
    textMid: '#93c5fd',
    riskHigh: '#c0392b',
    riskMed: '#e67e22',
    riskLow: '#27ae60',
    navBg: '#080f1f',
    tickerBg: '#0a1628',
    inputBg: '#0a1628',
    tableHeaderBg: '#0a1628',
    rowHover: '#0d1e35cc',
    cardHoverBorder: '#2563eb55',
    shadow: '0 4px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.5)',
  },
  light: {
    name: 'Light Ops',
    icon: '◎',
    bg: '#f0f4fa',
    bgGrad: 'linear-gradient(160deg,#e8f0fe 0%,#f0f4fa 60%,#e3ecf8 100%)',
    surface: '#ffffff',
    surfaceAlt: '#f5f8ff',
    border: '#c0d0e8',
    borderLight: '#dde8f5',
    accent: '#1d4ed8',
    accentAlt: '#0891b2',
    accentGrad: 'linear-gradient(135deg,#1d4ed8,#0891b2)',
    text: '#0f1c36',
    textMuted: '#4a6080',
    textSub: '#1d4ed8',
    textMid: '#2563eb',
    riskHigh: '#dc2626',
    riskMed: '#d97706',
    riskLow: '#16a34a',
    navBg: '#1e3a5f',
    tickerBg: '#162d4e',
    inputBg: '#f5f8ff',
    tableHeaderBg: '#eef3fb',
    rowHover: '#e8f0febb',
    cardHoverBorder: '#2563eb33',
    shadow: '0 4px 24px rgba(0,0,50,0.1)',
  },
  red: {
    name: 'Red Alert',
    icon: '⚠',
    bg: '#0f0505',
    bgGrad: 'linear-gradient(160deg,#0f0505 0%,#1a0808 60%,#100606 100%)',
    surface: '#160606',
    surfaceAlt: '#1c0808',
    border: '#5a1a1a',
    borderLight: '#3a1010',
    accent: '#dc2626',
    accentAlt: '#f97316',
    accentGrad: 'linear-gradient(135deg,#dc2626,#f97316)',
    text: '#f5e0e0',
    textMuted: '#a06060',
    textSub: '#f87171',
    textMid: '#fca5a5',
    riskHigh: '#ef4444',
    riskMed: '#f97316',
    riskLow: '#22c55e',
    navBg: '#160606',
    tickerBg: '#1c0808',
    inputBg: '#1c0808',
    tableHeaderBg: '#1c0808',
    rowHover: '#2a1010cc',
    cardHoverBorder: '#dc262655',
    shadow: '0 4px 24px rgba(220,38,38,0.2)',
  },
  green: {
    name: 'Ghost Protocol',
    icon: '⬡',
    bg: '#030f06',
    bgGrad: 'linear-gradient(160deg,#030f06 0%,#051a09 60%,#030e05 100%)',
    surface: '#051206',
    surfaceAlt: '#071808',
    border: '#0d4a1a',
    borderLight: '#0a2e10',
    accent: '#16a34a',
    accentAlt: '#06d6a0',
    accentGrad: 'linear-gradient(135deg,#16a34a,#06d6a0)',
    text: '#d1fae5',
    textMuted: '#4a8060',
    textSub: '#34d399',
    textMid: '#6ee7b7',
    riskHigh: '#ef4444',
    riskMed: '#f59e0b',
    riskLow: '#10b981',
    navBg: '#051206',
    tickerBg: '#071808',
    inputBg: '#071808',
    tableHeaderBg: '#071808',
    rowHover: '#0a2010cc',
    cardHoverBorder: '#16a34a55',
    shadow: '0 4px 24px rgba(22,163,74,0.15)',
  },
};

export const THEME_ORDER = ['dark', 'light', 'red', 'green'];
